ARABIC: يَسْتَعْجِلُونَكَ بِٱلْعَذَابِ وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمُحِيطَةٌۢ بِٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They ask you to hasten the punishment but Hell already encircles the kafirun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They want you to hasten the punishment: Hell will indeed surround the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They ask you to hasten the chastisement upon them although Hell encompasses the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They demand you to bring upon them the torment immediately. Hell will certainly engulf the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They urge you to hasten the punishment; and indeed hell has encompassed the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They ask you to hasten on the torment. And verily, Hell, of a surety, will encompass the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They ask you to hasten on the chastisement, and most surely hell encompasses the unbelievers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They demand of thee to hasten the chastisement! Lo, Gehenna encompasses the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They bid thee hasten on the doom, when lo! hell verily will encompass the disbelievers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They ask you to hasten the punishment, but surely, Hell is [already] encompassing those who deny the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They ask thee to hasten on the torment; and verily the Hell is about to encompass the infidels.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They ask you to hasten the punishment, and indeed hell will besiege the faithless
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They ask thee to hasten on the Punishment: but, of a surety, Hell will encompass the Rejecters of Faith!-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They ask you to hasten on the torment. And verily! Hell, of a surety, will encompass the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They demand that you hasten on the punishment! Gehenna (Hell) will encompass the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They urge you to hasten the punishment. But Hell will engulf the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They urge you to hasten the punishment. And indeed, Hell will be encompassing of the disbelievers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [29:54] And they ask you to hasten the chastisement, in this world. And lo! Hell shall encompass the disbelievers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They bid you) Muhammad (hasten on the doom) in the life of this world, (when lo! Hell verily will encompass the disbelievers) and gather them all together.
